analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.clearnlp.ClearNlpSemanticRoleLabeler

configurationParameter.name: printTagSet
configurationParameter.description: Write the tag set(s) to the log when a model is loaded.

configurationParameter.name: language
configurationParameter.description: Use this language instead of the document language to resolve the model.

configurationParameter.name: modelVariant
configurationParameter.description: Variant of a model the model. Used to address a specific model if here are multiple models for one language.

configurationParameter.name: predModelLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location from which the predicate identifier model is read.

configurationParameter.name: roleModelLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location from which the roleset classification model is read.

configurationParameter.name: srlModelLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location from which the semantic role labeling model is read.

configurationParameter.name: expandArguments
configurationParameter.description:
Normally the arguments point only to the head words of arguments in the dependency tree. With this option enabled, they are expanded to the text covered by the minimal and maximal token offsets of all descendants (or self) of the head word.

Warning: this parameter should be used with caution! For one, if the descentants of a head word cover a non-continuous region of the text, this information is lost. The arguments will appear to be spanning a continuous region. For another, the arguments may overlap with each other. E.g. if a sentence contains a relative clause with a verb, the subject of the main clause may be recognized as a dependent of the verb and may cause the whole main clause to be recorded in the argument.
